cmp: 专 (for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized, concentrated/specialized)

exm.mng: lit. to throw a brick to attract jade (idiom); fig. I offer a humble remark, please give us your valued opinion (e.g. commonplace remarks as a foreword to a distinguished speech)
lit. a brick as a door knocker (idiom); fig. a temporary expedient, to use sb as a stepping stone to fortune
lit. black brick kiln, factories that acquired notoriety in 2007 for slave labor
